LanguageData.OM_warning_load_existing_saves: Warning: Adding "Optimization: Meat - C# Edition" to an existing save may cause errors, see the workshop page for more information.
LanguageData.OM_settings_note: It is recommended to leave the meat policy in its default state.\nOnly use it in exceptional cases where you need to set it manually.
LanguageData.OM_restart_required: NOTE: requires a restart for the changes to take effect.
LanguageData.OM_note_useMeatFrom: This race's meat def depends on the other race's meat def: {0}
LanguageData.OM_note_specificMeatDef: This race's meat def is specified to be: {0}
LanguageData.OM_note_specialMeat: This race's meat is considered special in this mod and cannot be modified.
LanguageData.OM_note_whitelist: This race's meat is automatically ignored from the merge by the whitelist added by modders. (by race)
LanguageData.OM_note_whitelist_meat: This race's meat is automatically ignored from the merge by the whitelist added by modders. (by meat)
